Service Details: - Provides complete prenatal, intrapartum and postpartum care for childbearing families- Clients are accepted into care during pregnancy and are supported until 6-8 weeks postpartum- Offers support for the intense work that the childbearing year requires, trust in the innate ability of women to birth their babies, and the empowerment of women to achieve their best birth possible
Cost: None * Fee assistance available ; assistance is provided by Medical Services Plan of BC.
